BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.BiSignal.writeToBiSignal#
BlackBox.type:
writeToBiSignal# :: HasCallStack         -- ARG[0]
                                 -> BiSignalIn ds d a    -- ARG[1]
                                 -> Signal (Maybe a)     -- ARG[2]
                                 -> Signal d Bool        -- ARG[3]
                                 -> Signal d a           -- ARG[4]
                                 -> BiSingalOut ds d a   -- RESULT

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.BiSignal.readFromBiSignal
BlackBox.type:
readFromBiSignal :: HasCallStack      -- ARG[0]
                                 => BiSignalIn ds d a -- ARG[1]
                                 -> Signal d a        -- RESULT
